thread.section_title: Edge Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfort near the hospital
thread.title_full: Comfort near the hospital - Review of Edge Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Berhe T
title: Comfort near the hospital
text: We decided to stay at the Edge hotel because the proximity to the NY Presbyterian hospital. The Edge meets high standards of a boutique hotel and at the same time gives a welcoming comfort to whom like us needed to cope due to health reasons. Being from NY ourselves, space was not an issue but we appreciated all amenities from the gym to the business stations and fresh bagels in morning. Internet is fast and reliable.
